title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 397.2 - Vehicle speed limits
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 397.2 - Vehicle speed limits

State Regulations
(a) A rate of
speed in excess of 30 miles a hour, except where otherwise posted, on any park
road or drive is prohibited and a rate of speed over 25 miles an hour in a
parking field is prohibited except where otherwise posted. (b) Where the rate of speed is reduced by
signs posted by the office, a rate of speed greater than that indicated on such
signs is prohibited. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
397.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
